name: Avoider (itch) (DiavoloDB)
description:
A small prototype / demo of a bullet heaven game inspired by Vampire Survivors. 

—--------------- 

Gameplay:

* Avoid enemies while collecting coins, installing upgrades to your ship and slowly becoming an indestructible force. 

* Basic loot rewards & permanent upgrades systems already in the game, so feel free to experiment with that. 

—------------------------

Warning:

This is a demo / prototype aswell as my first ever pc game, it will most likely contain many bugs and similar issues, you've been properly warned. 

—-------------------

Testers:  ItsOkayBae(Quiet Studios)
